title: Ticket #4640: Bug if NEGTIATOR_CONSIDER_PREEMPTION is false
description: If NEGOTIATOR_CONSIDER_PREEMPTION is False, the negotiator should stop negotiating after a schedd limit is hit and/or there are no more unclaimed slots. CMS reports, however, that the negotiation cycle sometimes erroneously continues in these circumstances, resulting in the negotiation cycle taking much longer than would otherwise be required. ToddT did a code inspection, and it looks like a bug was introduced in #2054 that could trigger this behavior.
